title: A1708 - "No camera Available " After Display change
message: I have replaced the Display assembly with a new one and now the client complains that the "CAMERA NOT AVAILABLE " error when he opens the Facetime, What could be wrong?

title: A1708 - "No camera Available " After Display change
message: Test swapping back the old display, if you have camera on that one then the new display is bad quality, very common

title: A1708 - "No camera Available " After Display change
message:
If you bought the LCD assembly from Aliexpress, you can expect any weird issue.

Connect old display assembly and test with external monitor.
If still get the same error, then check L4010.

title: A1708 - "No camera Available " After Display change
message: Indeed, It's from aliexpress, Confirmed its bad display, I suspect that they have not coated/masked the flexgate cable solder points (Which is not the case in the original display).
